name: Love-lies-bleeding (Huautli)
description: We descend into the crater of the Teuhtli Eduardo is thinking of buying a poison suction pump on Amazon Around the volcano as in deserts there is always someone lurking We bring flowers, fruits, honey A spiral branch but One doesn't talk here One only listens to the Quechua bag the semi-circle the double cross the turning of the lathe The earth blocks are contoured with small stones We have Jesus with us, Salvadoran Ernesto and Grace I, too, incarnate grace I think Iâ€™ve discovered something
